EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-26-CAE-Ignite-Reminder.ES-2017-09-26-CAE-Ignite-Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Dinner Tonight with Turbonomic at Microsoft Ignite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tonight at Marlow's Tavern for a Community Networking Dinner following the second day of Microsoft Ignite!
Turbonomic Community Networking Dinner
Marlow's Tavern Pointe Orlando, 9101 International Drive, Orlando, FL 32819 Tuesday, September 26th, 7:00 PM EDT
If you are no longer able to attend or have any questions regarding the dinner, please respond directly to this email.
We can't wait to see you there!
Cheers,
Your friends at Turbonomic
